    • getLimitMessages

      public List<Message> getLimitMessages(String session, int limit)
      Description copied from interface: IMessageHistoryProvider
      Retrieves a limited number of recent messages associated with a given chat session. This can be useful for scenarios where only the most recent chat history is needed.
      Specified by:
      getLimitMessages in interface IMessageHistoryProvider
      Parameters:
      session - The unique identifier representing the chat session.
      limit - The maximum number of recent messages to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list containing up to limit recent messages from the chat session.
